scopeId.description: Identifier of scope. Currently it is applicable for scope GROUP only and the value will be groupId.

created.description: The date on which the workflow was created. Format would be yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ. For example, e.g 2016-02-25T18:46:19Z represents UTC time

displayName.description: The display name of the workflow.

scope.description: The workflow scope (ACCOUNT or GROUP or OTHER)

description.description: Description provided for this workflow at the time of its creation

id.description: The unique identifier of a workflow

status.description: The workflow status (ACTIVE or DRAFT or INACTIVE or OTHER)

errorResponses.reason: INVALID_ACCESS_TOKEN: Access token provided is invalid or has expired.
PERMISSION_DENIED: The API caller does not have the permission to execute this operation.
INVALID_GROUP_ID: The Group ID specified is invalid.
MISC_SERVER_ERROR: Some miscellaneous error has occurred.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An OAuth Access Token with scopes:
  • workflow_read
in the format 'Bearer {accessToken}'.

parameters.name: x-api-user
parameters.description: The userId or email of API caller using the account or group token in the format userid:{userId} OR email:{email}. If it is not specified, then the caller is inferred from the token.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: The group identifier for which the workflows will be fetched
